PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12382017-10-06,  ,  LGC,  , 
ActNational Security and Intelligence Committee of Parliamentarians Act
SubjectNational Security and Intelligence Committee of Parliamentarians Regulations
PrecisNATIONAL SECURITY AND INTELLIGENCE COMMITTEE OF PARLIAMENTARIANS REGULATIONS in order to establish the security requirements necessary to mitigate the risk that access to sensitive information by National and Intelligence Committee of Parliamentarians Members could lead to unauthorized disclosures that would be injurious to Canadian national security, national defence, and international relations, as well as the privacy interests of individuals.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0222 Publication Date: 2017-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
